text: tavada “oba, obage særayatiya visi karanu” (yayi ohuta kiyanu læbiya. e andamatama ohu eya visa kala vita), eya visala nagayek bavata pat vi selavenu dutu ohu (biya vi), u ohu pasupasa noelava sitinu pinisa, apasu hæri nobala divveya. (e avasthavedi ohuta) “o musa! biya novi oba idiriyata enu. niyata vasayenma oba (sæma akarayakatama) araksa karanu labana ayagen keneki”
